thread.title: Employees Provident Fund Organisation to observe ‘vigilance week’
thread.title_full: Employees Provident Fund Organisation to observe ‘vigilance week’ | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Employees Provident Fund Organisation to observe ‘vigilance week’
text:
Other Articles DBS sees FY16 GDP growth at 7.4% with downside risks Niti Aayog may discuss issues facing electronics sector on Monday Realty destination: With $2 bn investments in H1 2015, Dubai a new favourite for Indians Employees Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) will be observing a “vigilance week” from October 26 to 31 at its Mumbai regional office to address the grievances of EPF members and employers.
During the ‘vigilance week’, a separate counter will be opened on the ground floor of the office for registering complaints and suggestions by the EPF members and employers, KL Goyal, Additional Central PF Commissioner, said in a release today.
Complaints can also be made on the telephone lines 26476129/ 26470007/2647510 or online by logging www.epfigms.gov.in, the release said.
 24, 2015 1:17 pm
